Attributes.description: Work experience. Restricted to students admitted to the Co-operative Education Program in the Biotechnology or Microbiology and Immunology specializations. Pass/Fail
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of MICB 211, MICB 201 and one of MICB 212, MICB 202; or (b) BIOT 380.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon, Start Time: 7:00, End Time: 7:30
